lessons.title: What is a Computer Keyboard?
lessons.content:
A computer keyboard is an input device that allows users to type letters, numbers, and commands into a computer.

lessons.title: Layout of the Keyboard
lessons.content: The keyboard layout shows how keys are arranged on a computer keyboard...

lessons.title: Categories of Keys
lessons.content: The keyboard is made up of many keys that are grouped according to their functions...

lessons.title: Special Keys and Their Functions
lessons.content: Special keys are the keys on the keyboard that perform specific tasks...

lessons.content: Learning how to use the keyboard correctly helps you type faster and more accurately...

lessons.content: Numeric keys are used to type numbers...

lessons.content: The home row is where your fingers rest when typing...

lessons.content: The top row contains the letters Q to P...

lessons.title: Bottom Row Keys
lessons.content: The bottom row has letters Z, X, C, V, B, N, M...

lessons.title: Punctuation Keys

lessons.content: There are different types of mice for different purposes...

lessons.content: A standard mouse has several buttons...

lessons.content: Common mouse actions include single click, double click...
